title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A –
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – 

EU Digital Covid Certificates) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - eu digital covid certificates) regulation 2021

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: In these Regulations -
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations - 

“Digital Covid Certificate Regulation” means Regulation (EU) 2021/953 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 14 June 20211 on a framework for 
the 
interoperable COVID-19 
vaccination, test and recovery certificates (EU Digital COVID Certificate) to 
facilitate free movement during the COVID-19 pandemic; 

issuance, verification and acceptance of 

“EU Digital Covid Certificate” has the meaning it has in the Digital Covid 
Certificate Regulation; 

“General Data Protection Regulation” means Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 20162 on the protection of 
natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free 
movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC; 

“personal data” has the meaning it has in Article 4 of the General Data 
Protection Regulation; 

“third country national” means a person who is - 

(a) 

not a national of a Member State, 

(b) 

legally staying or residing in the State, and 

1 OJ No. L 211, 15.06.2021, p. 1 
2 OJ No. L119, 4.5.2016, p.1 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 6th July, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [317] 3 

(c) 

entitled to travel to Member States other than the State in 
accordance with the law of the European Union.

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 3. A person or body in the State that issues EU Digital Covid Certificates
text_raw:
3. A person or body in the State that issues EU Digital Covid Certificates 

in accordance with - 

(a) 

(b) 

the Digital Covid Certificate Regulation, and 

the European Union (EU Digital Covid Certificates) Regulations 
2021 (S.I. No. 318 of 2021), 

may issue such a certificate to a third country national in accordance with that 
Regulation and those Regulations.
text_norm: 3 person body state issue eu digital covid certificate accordance - (a) (b) digital covid certificate regulation european union (eu digital covid certificates) regulation 2021 (s.i no 318 2021) may issue certificate third country national accordance regulation regulation

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 4. An obligation under the Digital Covid Certificate Regulation or the
text_raw:
4. An obligation under the Digital Covid Certificate Regulation or the 
European Union (EU Digital Covid Certificates) Regulations 2021 relating to 
the processing of personal data (including an obligation on a natural person, a 
legal person, a public authority, an agency or another body that has 
administered a Covid-19 vaccine, or carried out a test in respect of which an 
EU Digital Covid Certificate is to be issued) shall apply in respect of the 
personal data of a third country national. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 July, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [317]

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations, made under Section 31A (inserted by section 10 of the 
Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency Measures in the 
Public Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 
1947), allow for the issuance, verification and acceptance of certificates in line 
with the Digital COVID Certificate Regulations (EU) 2021/953 to third 
country nationals legally staying or legally residing in the State. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [317] 5
